game.name: Robovenger
game.shortDescription: 로보 벤저는 플레이어가 위험한 광산을 통해 점프 민첩 로봇을 제어하는 동적 플랫 포머입니다. 당신의 목표는 원수 위험한 플랫폼을 피하면서 가능한 한 많은 루비를 수집하는 것입니다. 광산에 깊이 가서 점수를 개선하기 위해 정확하게 점프!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Robovenger is an action-packed platformer where players control a nimble and bouncy robot. Their task is to collect rubies in the mines while avoiding enemies and treacherous platforms that could lead to a perilous fall. Jump skillfully to go deeper into the mine and improve your score!

reviewHighlights.text: A cool dynamic platformer where you control a nimble and jumpy robot with the task of collecting as many rubies as possible in the mines and not falli...
A simple but fascinating arcade game with a variety of levels and enemies.
